mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TABLE_A ( INDEX_A , DATE_A , REQUEST_DATE , TIME) SELECT _SEQUENCE.nextval AS INDEX_A, (TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (LEVEL - 1)) AS DATE_A, TRUNC(CAST(SYSDATE AS TIMESTAMP) AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'), TO_CHAR(CAST(SYSDATE AS TIMESTAMP) AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul', 'HH24:MI'), FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 # Mybatis에서 '<'와 같은 특수 기호를 인식 하지 못할 때 => <= 으로 사용
